headline.seo: Michael Moore - Cuba - Health Care - Medicine - Movies - Cannes

docs.lead_paragraph: “Sicko” savages the American health care system and extols Cuba’s system as the neatest thing since the white linen guayabera.
docs.snippet: “Sicko” savages the American health care system and extols Cuba’s system as the neatest thing since the white linen guayabera.

headline.sub: A Struggle to Keep Up With Nimble Rivals;
headline.main: Coke Struggles to Keep Up With Nimble Rivals

docs.abstract: Matt Swafford letter on May 13 article about Leonard Nimoy photographs of obese women holds that it is unhealthy for women to be so overweight and they should not be revered in photographs
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I am troubled by the seemingly reactionary use of obese female models by Leonard Nimoy and others (''Girth and Nudity, a Pictorial Mission'' by Abby Ellin, May 13). Fat is not beautiful -- obesity is one of society's worst public health problems.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:     I am troubled by the seemingly reactionary use of obese female models by Leonard Nimoy and others (''Girth and Nudity, a Pictorial Mission'' by Abby Ellin, May 13). Fat is not beautiful -- obesity is one of society's worst public...

headline.print_headline: Kentucky Cardiologist Is Choice For Surgeon General
headline.main: Kentucky Cardiologist Is Choice for Surgeon General

docs.lead_paragraph: President Bush has nominated a Kentucky cardiologist who is interested in fighting childhood obesity to be the next surgeon general, the White House announced. The nominee, Dr. James W. Holsinger Jr., a professor of preventive medicine at the University of Kentucky, has led Kentucky’s health care system, taught at several medical schools and served more than three decades in the Army Reserve, retiring in 1993 as a major general.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Revisits Health Care and Affordability
headline.main: Clinton Revisits Health Care and Affordability

docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Hillary Rodham Clinton, who endured a major political setback as first lady when she tried to promote universal health care, revived that crusade but in a more measured way.
docs.snippet: Senator Hillary Rodham Clinton, who endured a major political setback as first lady when she tried to promote universal health care, revived that crusade but in a more measured way.

headline.print_headline: Off the Back Of a Truck, And Healthy

headline.print_headline: In Market, Hopes for Health and Urban Renewal
headline.main: In Market, Hopes for Health and Urban Renewal

docs.lead_paragraph: The fight against obesity has become a major rationale for efforts to bring supermarkets to what have been called the food deserts of poor urban areas.
docs.snippet: The fight against obesity has become a major rationale for efforts to bring supermarkets to what have been called the food deserts of poor urban areas.

The nominee, Dr. James W.
